title: Code Warriors Network Security Audit
description: Audit and reinforce security protocols for Code Warriors infrastructure. Review firewall configurations and implement zero-trust architecture for the hackathon network.
steps: Connect to secure VPN and authenticate with 2FA
Run automated security scan on all server instances
Review firewall rules and identify outdated configurations
Implement zero-trust policies for internal network segments
Document all changes and update security protocols
Generate compliance report and submit to Code Warriors command

title: Field Reconnaissance - Connaught Place
description: Survey the central business district for potential security vulnerabilities. Document entry points and surveillance coverage in the heart of Delhi.
steps: Arrive at designated coordinates during business hours
Conduct perimeter walk and identify all entry/exit points
Document security camera positions and blind spots
Note security personnel patrol patterns and timing
Photograph key infrastructure points (discreetly)
Compile findings and upload encrypted report

title: Encrypted Communication Protocol
description: Develop and test new end-to-end encryption system for secure team communications. Implement key rotation mechanism for Code Warriors operations.
steps: Set up isolated development environment
Implement AES-256 encryption for message payload
Create automated key rotation system (24-hour cycle)
Build secure key exchange protocol
Conduct penetration testing with security team
Deploy to staging environment and monitor for 48 hours

title: Asset Recovery - DPS Vasant Kunj Campus
description: Retrieve classified equipment from secure storage facility at DPS Vasant Kunj. Verify inventory and transport to secure location for Code Warriors hackathon setup.

location.address: DPS Vasant Kunj, Sector C, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, India

steps: Arrive at DPS Vasant Kunj campus and verify perimeter security
Access facility using provided credentials
Locate storage unit in the computer lab wing
Verify all items against provided inventory list
Secure equipment in transport containers
Transport to designated Code Warriors venue and confirm delivery

title: Network Penetration Testing
description: Conduct authorized penetration test on client infrastructure. Document vulnerabilities and provide remediation recommendations for Code Warriors participants.
steps: Review scope of engagement and authorized targets
Conduct initial reconnaissance and port scanning
Attempt common vulnerability exploits
Test for SQL injection and XSS vulnerabilities
Document all findings with severity ratings
Prepare detailed remediation report with timeline

title: Surveillance Equipment Deployment - India Gate
description: Install monitoring equipment at designated coordinates near India Gate. Ensure proper concealment and test signal transmission for the operation.

location.address: India Gate, Rajpath, New Delhi, India

steps: Scout location for optimal placement
Install primary monitoring device in concealed position
Set up backup power supply
Test signal strength and transmission quality
Camouflage installation site
Verify remote access and confirm operational status

title: Database Migration
description: Migrate legacy systems to new secure infrastructure. Ensure zero downtime and data integrity throughout process for Code Warriors platform.
steps: Create full backup of existing database
Verify backup integrity and test restoration
Set up parallel database instance on new infrastructure
Run migration scripts and validate data transfer
Perform comprehensive data integrity checks
Switch traffic to new database with zero downtime
Monitor for 24 hours and maintain rollback capability

title: Dead Drop Verification - Qutub Minar
description: Verify security of designated exchange location near Qutub Minar. Check for surveillance and establish backup protocols for Code Warriors intel exchange.

location.address: Qutub Minar Complex, Mehrauli, New Delhi, India

steps: Arrive 30 minutes early and observe from distance
Check for surveillance cameras and suspicious vehicles
Verify dead drop location is undisturbed
Test signal strength for emergency communications
Identify and document two backup locations nearby
Report findings and receive confirmation from command

title: Code Review - Authentication Module
description: Security audit of authentication system for Code Warriors platform. Identify potential vulnerabilities in session management and token handling.
steps: Clone repository and set up review environment
Run static analysis tools on authentication module
Manually review session management implementation
Check for common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
Test token generation and validation logic
Document findings and create remediation tickets

title: Safe House Inspection - Hauz Khas Village
description: Conduct security assessment of backup facility in Hauz Khas. Verify emergency protocols and supply inventory for Code Warriors operations.

location.address: Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi, India

steps: Verify perimeter security and entry points
Check all locks, alarms, and security systems
Inspect emergency supplies and medical kit
Test communication equipment and backup power
Verify escape routes and emergency protocols
Update inventory and report any deficiencies

title: Warrior Protocol Activation - DPS Command Center
description: Activate the Warrior Protocol at DPS Vasant Kunj command center. Initialize all systems for Code Warriors hackathon and verify operational readiness.

location.address: DPS Vasant Kunj, Sector C, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, India

steps: Access DPS command center using master credentials
Initialize primary systems and verify network connectivity
Activate Code Warriors monitoring dashboard
Test emergency communication channels
Verify all participant workstations are operational
Conduct final security sweep and declare system ready
Notify all Code Warriors operatives of activation status
